author: Simon Difford
description: This after-dinner sipper maybe creamy but it's balanced rather than sweet with aged rum nuanced by cognac and orange liqueur. Creamy yet sophisticated.
name: Platinum Blonde (creamy)
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
25 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
